message: I'd like to get a random point and see what the color is under that point in the browser window. Anyone have any ideas?
Might take a look at the color picker firefox plugin
I took a look at both that and a couple in chrome, they're both using private extension only API's as far as I can tell.
I'm pretty sure it's not possible…
You can do it in a <canvas> tag, not sure it's possible otherwise.
bummer, that's been my experience so far. I guess I'll just do it in PIL during the build stage (since I'm just interested in images)
